title: Frittelle di formaggio blu
description: Frittelle di formaggio erborinato, dal guscio croccante e dal cuore cremoso e filante.
ricetta_caption:
Blue Cheese Fritter  Get the Recipe on 

Find the link in the bio.

The distinct flavour of blue cheese is a either a love or miss for most people. Here at Gronda were a huge fan of this veiny cheese! Chef  feels the same way, which he won this weeks Top Creation with his Blue Cheese Fritter. Showcasing a way to achieve a crispy shell that holds a gooey, cheesy centre.
